prompt: Edit the uploaded photo as an ultra-realistic clean girl beauty editorial. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — facial structure, proportions, eyes, nose, lips, jawline, cheekbones, skin tone, expression unchanged. Eyelashes: exact original length, curl pattern, density — no mascara effect, no volume change. Eyebrows: exact original shape, density, color, arch, position. HAIR: Straight, loose, brushed back, natural volume, same color as original. No headwear, no accessories. SKIN: Ultra-detailed natural texture — visible pores, microtexture, natural imperfections preserved. Subtle natural freckles. Hydrated glossy glow as if deeply moisturized — radiant but not oily. Professional editorial retouch preserving real skin texture, micro-contrast enhancement. SETUP: Clean white studio background, soft diffused studio lighting. Shot on 85mm f/1.8, sharp focus, shallow depth of field. 4:5 vertical format.
